mapper.insert: insert into calcu_chng_rec (calcuChngNum, calcuChngDay, calcuChngTime, bakDay, bakTime, moneySales, cardSales) values(#{calcuChngNum},#{calcuChngDay},#{calcuChngTime},#{bakDay},#{bakTime},#{moneySales},#{cardSales})
mapper.select: select calcuChngNum, calcuChngDay, calcuChngTime, bakDay, bakTime, moneySales, cardSales from calcu_chng_rec Where calcuChngNum=#{calcuChngNum}
select calcuChngNum, calcuChngDay, calcuChngTime, bakDay, bakTime, moneySales, cardSales from calcu_chng_rec where calcuChngNum> 0 order by calcuChngNum desc
